page.title: 10SURVEY PHOTOGRAPHER,WARGRAVE
page.content:
When our class first knew about the{ {Domesday Project,}I knew straight away that I wanted to be the{Photographer} for this project because it is my hobby.
One Thursday, after school, about 5 of us went in the minibus from{Wargrave } to{Shiplake}to survey the village. Before we set out we were all given a map and put into pairs. Each pair took a different route through the area. While my partner counted amenities, I was looking for photos to take.
I tried to find subjects which in a hundred years time will have gone out of date, so people can look back and say{"Oh, look at that old fashioned {object."}After I photographed the fire engine at Wargrave Festival I was invited to visit the Fire Station.
